project.name: Y3U4L3-TCP
project.notes: This is a simulation of the Internet Protocol. There are only two nodes on the network, and their "IP addresses" are "Alice" and "Bob."

block.l: Click on one of us to send a message.

block-definition.comment: Do not edit this block. It simulates the unreliable network.

custom-block.comment: Do not edit the SEND IP PACKET block. It simulates the unreliable network.

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), hats = []; if (message !== '') { stage.lastMessage = message; process.getObjectsNamed(spriteName, this, stage).forEach(function (morph) { hats = hats.concat(morph.allHatBlocksFor(message)); }); hats.forEach(function (block) { stage.threads.startProcess(block, stage.isThreadSafe); }); }
